skills.description: In 2015 I started out my career as a UX designer. I chose this profession simply because it brings me joy. I love that, as a designer, I can help people with creativity. When I try to explain what UX is (which is not that rare of an occurrence), I usually tell people that it is the process of enhancing user satisfaction with a product by improving the usability, accessibility, and pleasure provided in the interaction with the product.

Server-side development is where the magic happens behind the scenes. I build robust APIs, manage databases, and ensure seamless data flow. From authentication systems to complex business logic, I create the foundation that powers great user experiences.

Design is not just about making things look pretty - it's about solving problems and creating meaningful experiences. I approach every design challenge with empathy for the user and a deep understanding of business goals and technical constraints.

The right tools make all the difference in development workflow. I leverage modern development tools and practices to ensure code quality, efficient deployment, and seamless collaboration across teams and projects.

Mobile-first is not just a buzzword - it's a necessity in today's world. I create native and cross-platform mobile applications that deliver exceptional user experiences across iOS and Android platforms.

Quality assurance is crucial for delivering reliable software. I implement comprehensive testing strategies including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end testing to ensure robust and maintainable applications.
